customHeadContent:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/ui/1.14.1/jquery-ui.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://code.jquery.com/ui/1.14.1/themes/base/jquery-ui.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.fontawesome.com/releases/v5.12.1/css/all.css" crossorigin="anonymous">

<script src="https://js.stripe.com/v3/" defer></script>
<style>
  #card-element {
    width: 400px;
	}
</style>
<style>
.errorDetails {
    background-color: red;
    border-radius: 5px;
    margin: 5px;
}  
.card-container {
    background-color: rgb(240, 240, 240);
    margin: auto;
    width: calc(95%);

    border: none;
    border-radius: 4px;
}
.form-group {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    flex-flow: column !important;
}
#checkout-form {
    position: relative;
    width: 400px;
    padding: 10px;
}

#checkout-form label {
    display: block;
    min-height: 25px;

    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: 500;
    margin: 5px 0;
    padding: 0;
    color: red;
}

#card-number, #card-cvv, #card-expiry {
    background-color: #FFF;
    display: block;
    width: calc(90%);
    border-radius: 2px;
    border: 1px solid rgba(200, 200, 200, 1);
    padding: 14px 60px 13px 20px;
    margin: auto;
    transition: all 100ms ease-out;
}

/* card images are added to card number */
#card-number {
    background-image: none;

    background-origin: content-box;
    background-position: calc(100% + 40px) center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: contain;
}

/* buttons */
.btn {
    vertical-align: top;
}

#pay-button {
    position: relative;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background-color: #0c384f;
    color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
    display: inline-block;
    transition: all 100ms ease-out;
    padding: 11px 25px;
    margin-left: 30px;
}

#pay-button:hover, #pay-button:active {
    background-color: rgba(69, 36, 89, 1);
}

#pay-button:active {
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 35px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

#pay-button:disabled {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
    border: 1px solid #0c384f;
    color: #0c384f;
}

/* feedback is displayed after tokenization */
#feedback {
    position: relative;
    left: 15px;
    display: inline-block;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px solid rgba(200, 200, 200, 1);
    border-radius: 4px;
    transition: all 100ms ease-out;
    padding: 11px;
}

#feedback.error {
    color: red;
    border: 1px solid;
}

#feedback.success {
    color: seagreen;
    border: 1px solid;
}
</style>

<style>
.review_true {
	display: none;  
}
.discountEdit {
	margin-left: 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
}
input.percent {
    width: 80px;
}  
  
#memberTableDiv:before {
    content: "*";
    color: red;
    float: right;
}  
.editOptionText {
    margin: 10px;
    background-color: #eeeded;
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding: 4px;
}  
.editInactiveOptionText {
    margin: 10px;
    background-color: #c0e2c0;
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding: 4px;
}  
  
.editingOptions {
  display: flex;
 }
.editingOptions input {
    visibility: hidden;
}
.editingOptions label {
		width: 250px;  
    background-color: gray;
    padding: 5px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    color: white !important;
    cursor: pointer;
}
.editingOptions input[type='radio']:checked + label {
    background-color: #4d5059;
}
  
#checkout-form iframe {
    height: 18px;
}  
.errorDetails {
    background-color: red;
    border-radius: 5px;
    margin: 5px;
}  
/* buttons */
.btn {
    vertical-align: top;
}
</style>
<style>
	.acceptTerms + label {
    margin-left: 20px !important;
	}  
  .hidden{
   display:none; 
  }
body a {
    color: #003b72;
}  
button.editButton {
    border-radius: .25rem;
    line-height: 1.0rem;
    padding: .2rem 0.8rem;
    margin-right: .5rem;
    border: none;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: .75rem;
    background-color: #0c384f;
}
.editingOptions button {
    background-color: #d7d1d1;
    border-color: gray;
}
.editingOptions button:hover, .editingOptions button:active, .editingOptions button:focus {
    background-color: gray !important;
}  
</style>

<style>
  .hidden{
   display:none; 
  }
</style>
<script>
	function completeRegisterUser() {
    debugger;
    var registerSettings = {
      "crossDomain": true,
      "url": K('space').attributes('Kinetic Billing Server URL')+"/registerUser",
      "method": "POST",
      "headers": {},
      "dataType": "json",
      "contentType": "application/json",
      "data": JSON.stringify({
        "customerId": K('field[Member ID]').value(),
        "firstName": K('field[Student First Name]').value(),
        "lastName": K('field[Student Last Name]').value(),
        "dob": K('field[DOB]').value(),
        "address": K('field[Address]').value(),
        "suburb": K('field[Suburb]').value(),
        "state": K('field[State]').value(),
        "postCode": K('field[Postcode]').value(),
        "email": K('field[Email]').value(),
        "mobile": K('field[Mobile]').value(),
        "payment": K('field[Fee Total]').value(),
        "firstPayment": K('field[Fee Total]').value(),
        "billingPeriod": K('field[Billing Period]').value(),
        "contractStartDate": K('field[Date Affective]').value(),
        "paymentMethod": K('field[Payment Method]').value()==="" || K('field[Payment Method]').value()===null ? "Credit Card" : K('field[Payment Method]').value(),
        "cardToken": bundle.sourceID,
        "gbmemberId": K('field[Billing Customer Id]').value(),
        "adminFee": K('field[Admin Fee]').value()!==null ? K('field[Admin Fee]').value().replace("%","") : "",
/*        "setupFee": K('field[Setup Fee]').value().replace("%",""), */
        "space": K('space').slug(),
        "billingService": K('space').attributes('Billing Company'),
        "currency": K('space').attributes('Currency'),
      })
    }
    $.ajax(registerSettings).done(function (response) {
      debugger;
      console.log(response);
      if (response.error===100) {
        var message=response.errorMessage;
        if (response.errorMessage==="DECLINE") {
          message="Credit Card not valid (Declined)";  
        }
        K('button[Submit]').enable();

        $("#errorValue").html(message);
        K('section[Card Error]').show();
      } else {
        K('section[Card Error]').hide();
        K('field[customerBillingId]').value(response.data.customerBillingId);
        K('field[Billing Customer Reference]').value(response.data.customerReference);
        K('form').submitPage();
      }
    });        
  }  
  
</script>
description:
All billing changes that are not freezes or cancellations will be processed through this form.

  • Manage billing details for existing members, whether they are for families or individuals.
  • Add or remove family members within an existing billing account.
  • Adjust the tuition pricing for an entire family or a single student.
  • Adjust the payment date or frequency.
name: Stripe Submit Billing Changes

events.name: Get Members
Clear Member Details

choices.label: ${resources('Get Billing Members:First Name')} ${resources('Get Billing Members:Last Name')}

events.name: Get Billing Info

elements.name: Editing Options
RescheduleDateOnlyInfo
elements.text:
Maintain the current Membership fee, and only select a new Billing Date.
Note, all failed billing attempts will not be retried.

elements.name: RescheduleWithDetailsInfo
elements.text: Note, all failed billing attempts will not be retried.

elements.name: EditBillingDetailsInfo
elements.text: This option will maintain the current Billing cycle.

elements.name: EditInactiveBillingDetailsInfo
elements.text:
The current Billing account is Inactive.
You need to select a new Billing Start date.
You can also maintain or rebuild the Program Fees.
Saving this form will create a new Recurring account.

bundle.completeTableChange();

elements.requiredMessage: Please ensure you have added appropriate Member Programs.

events.code: K('section[Update Stripe details]').hide();

elements.name: Update Information
elements.text: Leave this box checked to apply updates to Stripe billing. If unchecked, updates will only be reflected in GB Members and will not modify actual billing in Stripe.

elements.name: Immediately
elements.label: Immediately (The amount will be updated in GB Members and Stripe immediately for the next scheduled payment; billing dates will remain unchanged.)

events.name: Set Date Affective
events.code: K('field[Date Affective]').value(moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD"));

elements.name: Date Affective HTML
Resume Date Option
elements.label: Resume Date Option (Select Until further notice to maintain the new total until a new form is submitted. If you choose Resume date, the pricing will revert to the original total after the selected date.)

elements.name: Bank Account Capture
